name: The 3rd International Conference on Business Economics and Finance
content: The 3rd International Conference on Business Economics and Finance (BEF 2020) will be held during March 13-15, 2020 in Guilin, China. This Conference will cover issues on Asset pricing, Asset-liability management, Business Economics, Finance, Risk management and other related topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
